column4: hi i am new to ubuntu..i have a problem with the bootup..it's taking too long to configure the network interfaces...any ideas?
what is your network setup like?
its been a while since I messed with wifi, is it dhcp do you know? have you noticed the problem in windoze - note that windoze will config the net in the background...
if you can use static then yeah - the system wont really care if it works or not it will just set the card up with those settings...
